name: Forget: Chill
description:
Default Controls
  • Use spacebar and enter.
Story

Try and focus as your brain tries to sabotage you.

Created for the "Chill" Little Awfuljam, 2016.

Skip This?
  • It's very short and created in a very short time while I was sick.
